name: Frank RICHARDSON, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Frank RICHARDSON, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Motion for petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Johnson v. United States, 576 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 2551, 192 L.Ed.2d 569 (2015).
casebody.head_matter:
Frank RICHARDSON, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 15-6053.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 29, 2016.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Motion for petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Johnson v. United States, 576 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 2551, 192 L.Ed.2d 569 (2015).
